title: Purchasing missing but they show in purchase history
body: Yesterday I bought ivern, candy king ivern, aatrox, justicar aatrox and the "Tilt enemy or feed bundle". I used them in game and everything was fine, but when i came back the next day (today) and the bundle is locked so is aatrox and ivern but the purchases show in my history..... what is happening? Am I alone on this?

replies.body: That's a strange issue, and we'd like to take a closer look at your specific issue.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can see what happened.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!

I think it have to do with the clients. I had switched to legacy client to spectate my friend's game and I'm pretty sure I made the purchases on the legacy. Do you think that may have affected it in some way?
